Notes
-----
Main menu & chapter menu. Some "buffer errors" during the show are the cause for lost footage. i have faded in and out when this happens. Thirty-Three is pretty shaky.. I was getting pretty tired of being a human tri-pod. A minor audio errors are based on the original recording. The Audio was recored from the balcony next to my camera. 

Some Highlight: Billy does a lot of banter most of which are very funny. First appearance of Death From Above. Only appearance of Promise Me. Last (as of date) appearance of 7 Shades of Black & Translucent. Jimmy loses his drum sticks towards the end of Doomsday Clock, and more!


A HD 1080i BLU-RAY version currently not available for public circulation but does exist.
